Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add stacking limit \(1 unit per tile\) and city blockade mechanics

Major gameplay changes:
- Stacking limit: Only 1 unit per tile, units can pass through friendly tiles
- City blockade: Cities cannot produce when enemy unit is adjacent
- Production placement: Units spawn adjacent if city tile is occupied

Technical changes:
- MovementSystem: Allow pathing through friendly units, prevent stopping
- WarfireGame: Add blockade checks, update produceUnit spawn logic
- GameMap: Add isCityBlockaded\(\) helper method
- RenderSystem: Add visual blockade indicators \(red border + swords icon\)
- UIController: Show blockade status and stacking limit info
- AISystem: Respect tile occupancy and city blockades

Also includes existing changes from working directory.
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Implement new hero and ruin mechanics with improved AI

Hero changes:
- Hero is now a purchasable unit for 50 gold \(was free\)
- Removed artifact system completely
- Heroes now prioritize defending blockaded cities

Ruin changes:
- Ruins now give one-time random bonus and disappear
- Rewards: 50 gold, 100 gold, random unit, or new city
- Any unit can now explore ruins \(not just heroes\)
- Ruins spawn on adjacent free tile when creating unit/city

AI improvements:
- Aggressive early game expansion to neutral cities
- Priority order: neutral empty > enemy empty > ruins > enemy defended
- Opportunity attacks: AI attacks enemies along the way to objectives
- Waypoint bonuses for ruins and enemy cities on the path
- Improved city defense: units defend blockaded cities with high priority
- Heroes and fast units prioritize defense of threatened cities
- Production prioritizes fast units when cities are blockaded
- Units in blockaded cities attack blockers when possible

Files changed:
- constants.js: Hero cost 50, removed ARTIFACTS, added RUIN_REWARD_TYPES
- Unit.js: Removed artifact logic
- GameMap.js: Ruins now give random rewards and disappear
- WarfireGame.js: New ruin exploration handler with rewards
- AISystem.js: Complete AI overhaul for expansion and defense
- UIController.js: Updated ruin display \(no explored flag\)
EOF
\)")
